title: Game Asset Pack Manifest
description: Schema for game asset pack manifests that define pack-level metadata and individual asset files for import into the Asset Tracking System

pack_id.description: Unique identifier for the asset pack (UUID format)

pack_name.description: Human-readable name of the asset pack

root_path.description: Absolute path to the pack's root directory on disk

source.description: Origin of the pack (e.g., 'Unity Asset Store', 'Epic Marketplace', 'NAS')

license_link.description: URL or file path to license documentation

global_tags.description: Tags applicable to the entire pack

assets.description: Array of individual asset files within the pack

relative_path.description: Path relative to the pack's root_path

metadata.description: Flexible key-value pairs for file-specific metadata (e.g., dimensions, duration, poly_count)

local_tags.description: Tags specific to this asset, often derived from folder structure
